resources.string: Several students have had to grapple with academic and social failure due to the lack of tech enabled productivity tools. This To Do List application is a tech enable solution that leverages mobile application to help students manage their time and task effectively. We have built an amazing mobile app that enables international students to attain and maintain higher levels of academic success and social performance. The application comes with a seamless user experience and with the most recent android development technologies and has been made accessible on the Store. The Market Size for productive software stands at $20.3B globally and this app aims for a 50% market share, hence this innovative solution.
